item.title: Line Integral Convolution for Vector Field Visualization
item.description: How to visualize a line integral convolution for a vector field with yt

item.title: Particle Generators
item.description: This post shows how to generate particle fields from pre-defined particle lists, lattice distributions, and distributions based on density fields.
